description: Skin up, ski down, do it again. Perfect for high-output backcountry laps, the Rush Softshell pants deliver light weather protection, thermal comfort, breathability, and freedom to move. The material – durable 220gsm Wee Burly™ Double Weave – is wind resistant, water repellent, allows airflow, and provides outstanding stretch. A brushed backer adds light warmth, and a DWR treatment improves water repellency. Thigh vents dump heat on ascents, and the embedded RECCO® reflector can aid search and rescue.
name: Arcteryx Rush Softshell Pants, Reg - Mens
